name: claudecode-plugins
description: Marketplace de plugins da comunidade para Claude Code

plugins.name: git-commit-helper
plugins.description: Automatiza commits Git com validacoes completas, conventional commits e integracao com CI/CD. Suporte automatico para projetos Python com uv (universal virtualenv). NOVO: /quick-commit para commits rapidos sem validacoes extensivas

plugins.name: kubernetes-specialist
plugins.description: Advanced plugin for Kubernetes resource management, troubleshooting, and best practices implementation with MCP integration.

plugins.name: aws-documentation-helper
plugins.description: Comprehensive AWS documentation access and knowledge assistant powered by AWS Knowledge MCP Server.

plugins.name: langchain-ecosystem-helper
plugins.description: Comprehensive LangChain ecosystem helper for LangGraph agent development, LangChain orchestration, and LangSmith observability.

plugins.name: composio-documentation-helper
plugins.description: Comprehensive Composio documentation helper for AI agent integrations, managed authentication, 500+ toolkits, MCP servers, and event-driven workflows.

plugins.name: systemic-agent-orchestrator
plugins.description: Development orchestrator for production-ready AI Agents using LangGraph Graph API, AWS Bedrock Agent Core, Terraform, and Langsmith. Features: 7 commands (discovery, init-agent, add-node, validate-stack, resume-project, check-deps, micro-task); 2 agents (guardrail-enforcer, micro-task-guide); 11 skills; 9 validation hooks including Stop hook for automated test execution with 70% coverage requirement; Serena MCP integration.
